name: Node-bots
tagline: Resources for connecting node with the bots!
body:
# Nodebots

## johnny-five
A node module that bridges the gap between node.js and the devices that operate in the physical world, like Arduinos and Raspberry Pis.

## nodebot-workshop
[A series of easy code challenges that teach you how to write node.js for the Arduino.](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodebot-workshop)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
